=========================
graphic-verification-code
=========================

Graphic Verification Code

Installation
============

::

    pip install graphic-verification-code


Usage
=====

::

    In [1]: import gvcode

    In [2]: gvcode.generate()
    Out[2]: (<PIL.Image.Image image mode=RGB size=120x30 at 0x7FD2380E1310>, 'ubAR')

    In [3]: gvcode.base64()
    Out[3]:
    ('',
     'QnCg')
